testimonials.name: Justin Scholtz
testimonials.message: Jason is a very friendly and helpful person, always willing to help you with anything you struggling with which makes him the perfect candidate to have on your team and I haven't even mentioned his skill set yet which is top notch. Over the past 6 months, I've noticed that his a quick learner and is able to over come any challenge that his faced with.

testimonials.name: Summer De Wet
testimonials.message: Jason is a very considerate and helpful person who is very pleasant to work with. He is hardworking and always completes his tasks, Having him in your workplace will be an asset because he is a very hard worker

testimonials.name: Seth
testimonials.message: Jason is dedicated, hard working and a team player. He/She works well with his/her peers and performs well on his/her projects. He/She has a good understanding of web development and would be a valuable addition to any team that is lucky enough to have him.

testimonials.name: Imtiyaaz
testimonials.message: Jason is kind, hard-working person and is very interested in coding .He is very friendly and helpful when comes to giving new ideas .

testimonials.name: Rabia Haucha
testimonials.message: Jason is a go-getter ,he is really a gem whether on a personal or work level he is just a great human being overall.He is also very helpful and is quite intellectually smart .If you dont understand something he is always willing to explain and make sure you understand .He makes you feel comfortable and his really a joyous character.He really works hard and is very focused on his goals and work so don't disturb him but honestly a great guy and really he will make any company go from ZERO to HERO !

testimonials.name: Alonso Cupido
testimonials.message: Jason is a very great person he works well in a team and also works really hard , and he is always punctual. He has a good understanding of IT and web development, he would be a great asset to your team and a very reliable team member. Any team would be lucky if you were to accept him.
